description_exp1: Achieve significant frontend improvements, increasing system performance by 80% and improving user experience. I collaborated in the restructuring of the database, increasing its scalability and maintenance. Developed 90% of the functions for users and administrators. Additionally, I created more than 14 interactive websites for the company's clients.
description_exp2: In charge of designing the interactions, the database and the essential requirements for the development and operation of the system, I managed to create a usable and secure site that provides an optimal experience to users. By automating internal processes, I met the company's objectives, improving its performance and guaranteeing technological growth.
description_exp3: I implemented significant improvements to the interfaces, achieving an 85% increase in application performance. I detected, restructured and fixed various errors and functionalities that impacted the system logic. Additionally, I integrated payment methods for user subscriptions and designed new modules linked to the administrator role.
description_project1: WhatsApp clone that uses authentication through Google to allow users to chat with each other.
description_project2: Online store with home delivery service, simulation of product batches using the Pexels API and storage in LocalStorage for the shopping cart.
description_project3: Platform inspired by Yahoo and Stack Overflow that allows users to ask questions and seek opinions on a specific topic.
